info.title: Navigate to the last breadcrumb link in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterLastBreadcrumbLink
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the 'Breadcrumb Example' link
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the 'Breadcrumb Example' link
testPageDocument.querySelector('#afterlink').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Breadcrumb Example' link.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Breadcrumb Example' link.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Role of the landmark region, 'navigation', is conveyed
Name of the landmark region, 'Breadcrumb', is conveyed
'Role of the breadcrumbs container, 'list', is conveyed
Number of list items, 4, is conveyed
